supplier.name: KASUGA Co., Ltd.
supplier.address: NO.149, Sec. 1, Guofeng Rd., Shengang Dist., Taichung City 429, Taiwan
supplier.pr: PATLITE is a diversified, global company and highly-technology engineering and manufacturing company. Founded in 1947, PATLITE is a leading provider of innovative LED status indicating lights, sound alarms, visual and audible communication network system and solutions which enhance the safety, security and comfort of workplaces and communities. With more than 600 employees and the wholly-owned sales subsidiaries in the USA, Germany, Singapore, Korea, and China, PATLITE is widely recognized as the world top brand in the industry around the world.

supplier.name: NUMEN Machinery Co., Ltd.

supplier.pr: NUMEN is a manufacturer specialized in producing CNC high speed machining center. To achieve the utmost productive efficiency in mold industrial and parts machining, we always hold a steadfast belief in developing and researching for the better quality of our products. Through everlasting computerization and upgrading, we bear the best capability to satisfy our customers' needs and offer the highest class of service.

supplier.name: AKIRA SEIKI CO., LTD.

supplier.pr: Instituted technical centers for high speed spindle development.
